constituent: pork, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, sow, pig
hint: Pork comes from the flesh of a sow. Sowing machine cuts meat from the pig
koohiiStory1: Pork comes from the flesh of a sow.
koohiiStory2: One possible pictograph for "sow" primitive: the top line is a feeding trough, the stroke touching it is the head, the long curved stroke is the body (with a little hook at the end for the curly tail), and the four remaining strokes are the sow´s legs.
myStory: thịt heo. con heo. bộ phận con lợn
